definition: stinky tofu/strong-smelling preserved beancurd/fig. rough exterior but lovable person

sentences.english: Can you tell me where I can find the stinky tofu stand?
sentences.chinese: 你可以告诉我，哪里可以找到臭豆腐摊吗？

sentences.english: Deep frying at high temperatures both wipes out the bacteria and turns the stinky tofu sweetly fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 高温油炸既有杀菌效果，同时也能让臭豆腐转臭为香。

sentences.english: And his smelly old sock has been stuck to the wall.
sentences.chinese: 而他那臭豆腐袜还没离开过那幅墙。

sentences.english: I like the smelly bean curd there very much.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢大多数的中国菜，但是不喜欢臭豆腐。

sentences.english: Stinky Tofu - smells like shit - tastes great.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，还有臭豆腐，闻起来像屎，味道却棒极了。

sentences.english: I threw up when I smelled the stinky tofu.
sentences.chinese: 我闻到臭豆腐的味道时吐了出来。

sentences.english: Ex:The smell of stinky tofu scares certain people .
sentences.chinese: 有些人对臭豆腐的味道闻之却步。

sentences.english: Perl milk tea here and stinky tofu are the famous and feature our country.
sentences.chinese: 还有我认为真珠奶茶也可以代表台湾，还有臭豆腐。

sentences.english: I’m particularly delighted to be in Hunan because Hunan is the home of choudoufu [stinky tofu].
sentences.chinese: 特别高兴到湖南来，因为湖南是臭豆腐的家乡。

sentences.english: By the way, do all the stinky tofu vendors come from Hunan?
sentences.chinese: 对了，那些卖臭豆腐的商贩都是从湖南来的吗？

sentences.english: The pungent smell of stinky tofu fills the air.
sentences.chinese: 难闻的臭豆腐味弥漫在空气里。

sentences.english: I like most Chinese food, but I don't like stinky tofu!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢大多数的中国菜，但是不喜欢臭豆腐。

sentences.english: Because I know from the book the stinky tofu smell stinky, eat up very fresh.
sentences.chinese: 因为我从书上知道臭豆腐闻起来臭，吃起来很鲜。

sentences.english: Visitors to Changsha would be to have malodorous ' beancurd and other snack foods.
sentences.chinese: 游客到长沙可以吃到臭豆腐，以及其他小吃。

definition: sweet snack made from glutinous rice, sugar and honey, common in Changsha 長沙|长沙[Chang2 sha1], Hunan
five spice seasoned/incorporating the five basic flavors of Chinese cooking (sweet, sour, bitter, savory, salty)
